author: chenpei
msg: Bug fix for Common Type System
jCAS.indexes.getAnnotationIndex(DocumentID.type) will no longer work since it extends TOP instead of Annotation now.

author: chenpei
msg: Common Type System implementation bug fix.
Argh. DocumentIDAnnotationUtil swallowed the exception instead of throwing it back up or logging the error messages made it a pain to detect and debug.
DocumentID no longer inherits from Annotation but from Top instead.  It's been fixed now; please refresh DocumentIDAnnotationUtil.java

author: chenpei
msg: Removed auto generated source code from version control.
please use build.xml from files for clinical pipeline to generate the type classes instead.
